description:
A hands-on introduction to querying evolutionary relationships across multiple data sources using SPARQL.

The European Bioinformatics Institute.

OrthoDB RDF/SPARQL endpoint frontend.

Default Data Set Name (Graph IRI).

SPRARQL interface for searching of MBGD (MicroBial Genome Database for Comparative Genomics).

MBGD : Ontology : To Previous Version (2016).

Linked Open Data platform for EBI data.

This SPARQL 1.1 endpoint serves OrthoDB data.

prefix : <http://purl.orthodb.org/> select * where {?taxon a :Clade; up:scientificName ?name; up:rank ?rank} order by ?rank ?name.

select distinct.

||| COMMON LINK WITH (PUB. & NAME DIFFERENT) bio.tools/orthodb (ORTHODB.ORG), bio.tools/mbgd (GENOME.AD.JP).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'MBGD', 'OMA' (bio.tools/oma), 'RDF' (bio.tools/RDF), 'Semantic'
name: SPARQL
